code: import axios from"axios";var baseURL='http://localhost:4000/';export default{postMessage:function postMessage(){var url=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:baseURL+'postMessages/';return{fetchAll:function fetchAll(){return axios.get(url);},fetchById:function fetchById(id){return axios.get(url+id);},create:function create(newRecord){return axios.post(url,newRecord);},update:function update(id,updatedRecord){return axios.put(url+id,updatedRecord);},delete:function _delete(id){return axios.delete(url+id);}};}};
